certifications.title: HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for Web Developers

projects.name: OBE Tool (Outcome Based Evaluation for college)
projects.description: The OBE Tool strives to improve education at Manipal University, Jaipur. The aim is to improve the design process, evaluation and feedback process. The program is designed to help teachers, administrators, and students engage in effective teaching, decision-making, and engaged learning. OBE tools seek to contribute to the University's reputation for academic excellence and ensure student development by supporting continuous improvement.

projects.name: Disease Predictor (Disease Prediction by System using Supervised Learning)
projects.description: An automated disease prediction system that takes input from users and provides a list of probable diseases.

projects.name: HMS (Hospital Management System)
projects.description: In this Project we aim to solve the traditional issues of hospital management. The existing system provided paper based. The main issues were inappropriate data keeping, time wastage in storage, retrieval, also patients were unable to understand the prescription etc. These issues are solved by providing a separate user account for doctors, staff, and patients. Keeping each patients data separate and track previous visits in a single click. It provides some enhanced features such as: an easy interface to add and remove employees.

projects.name: Notes Taking App
projects.description: Built an user-friendly and simple notes-taking application utilizing HTML for the core structure, CSS for styling, JavaScript (JS) for interactivity, and MySQL for robust data persistence. This web-based app empowers users to add, update and delete their notes, ensuring important information is always readily accessible.

experiences.description: I was an Internshshala Student partner and an outstanding performer of Internshala's Campus Ambassador Program (ISP) 31st edition and got ranked 65 out of 91,509 students selected from different colleges across India.

skills: Machine Learning (regression, classification, clustering, decision trees, support sector machines, artificial neural networks)
